name: Duplicate File Fixer
description: Duplicate Files Fixer app that scans and deletes all types of duplicate files on your device. This duplicate media remover app will help you recover loads of storage space on your device so that you can save additional data or install other apps from the Play Store without having to face low storage warnings.  Why use Duplicate File Fixer?    Speed - Duplicate File Fixer is extremely fast when it comes to scanning and comparing a large number of photos within seconds.   Preview - Before moving ahead and deleting photos, you can have a clear look at them instead of opening them individually, using this feature.   Maximize device free storage - Photos occupy most of the storage space on your Android device & a lot of them are duplicates. Scanning & cleaning them from your device will help you release up to gigabytes of precious storage space from internal and external memory (SD Card) (if available).  Features:  * Effectively finding duplicate files with more speed * Categorized duplicate files like duplicate images, duplicate videos, duplicate audios, etc * Preview available for all files * Multiple selection, and build-in selection controls * Duplicate File Fixer remove all duplicate files just a single click * Remove Duplicate files on any external storage device.
